title: Tired of the Meta?
body:
As a friendly player, then, I would like to invite you to the two other permanent modes RIOT has provided: ARAM and Twisted Treeline!

I know, this does nothing to solve the problem of a rigid meta, but when you need to take a breather, both offer relief.

I hear your complaints already: ARAM has too many bots, and TT has ten minute queue times.

Well, the solution is simple: play, and get get your friends to play. The more people who play ARAM, the fewer bots there will be as a percentage of players. If you get your friends to play TT with you, the queue times will go down.

In all seriousness, we'd love to have you.

or like quinn mid and jayce...

I already stopped playing on the Rift entirely, all I play is ARAM this season so far. It's just sad how extremely bad the balance has gotten that I'm reduced to playing a RNG based gamemode for a better and still more fairer experience. At least you still have the chance NOT to encounter one of 20 overpowered champions on there and even then they work drastically different in a single lane environment. 

Another big bonus is the fact that games tend to end a lot quicker thus reducing the frustration of having to put up longer than necessary with blatantly snowballing teams which is a concept that personally has ruined the game for me. There are simply no comebacks anymore, so just let's get this shit over with so that I may get to queue up again.

Oh, it also made me love some champions I never got around to play as before. So there's definitely something good about that, it's a nice way to get some practice with them.
Not seen any ARAM bot since almost a year

Unfortunately, many people (myself included) play this game with emphasis on competition in combination with fun. Naturally, this makes metas a problem, but it also makes the options you provide a problem: Why play ARAM when you cannot build a team comp, causing a big chunk of games to be entirely won at champ select, just like summoner's rift? There are champions like Jax, where if the enemy has a certain character or two, you're just completely fucked and useless all game. Feeling completely helpless all game due to being a melee character with shit utility in a teamfight gamemode makes players like me hate the game mode.

Why play TT when Riot hasn't even tried balancing it for foreverness ago? Last I checked, there were still 65% winrate characters, and I haven't seen any changes for it. It's not a game mode that Riot shows any signs of supporting. This means, yes, the meta is strong there too, and if you don't pick top tier you lose. Unless top tier is a champion you love, this game mode also sucks dick for players like me.

It's a lose-lose-lose.

Well, there would be more of an incentive for Riot to address these balance issues if more people played and complained. As is, it's a vicious cycle of unbalance: why balance if no one plays it, why play it if it's never balanced? 

Furthermore, I did not say that there isn't a TT meta. Rather, I meant to imply that the meta is different.

I simply hope that more people join in so that this great game mode doesn't go away.
